item.title: STLA
item.description: score:1101 Chances: Stellantis faces intense competition in the EV market but has opportunities in profitable niches like electric boats. General Motors plans to increase employment for EV production, despite concerns of reduced labor needs. The Jeep brand celebrates the 30th anniversary of the ‘Jurassic Park’ film with an exclusive Jurassic Park Package for Wrangler and Gladiator vehicles.
